message.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?adf version="1.0"?><adf>
  <prospect>
    <requestdate>2025-10-18T16:50:36Z</requestdate>
    
      <vehicle interest="buy" status="used">
        <id sequence="1" source="cars.com">0dddebdb-b481-4fee-b2ef-eab714a47c75</id>

        <doors>4</doors>
        <bodystyle>Sedan</bodystyle>
        <transmission>6-Speed Automatic S tronic</transmission>
        <odometer units="mi">45425</odometer>
        <colorcombination>
          <interiorcolor>Rock Gray</interiorcolor>
          <exteriorcolor>Cosmos Blue Metallic</exteriorcolor>
          <preference>1</preference>
        </colorcombination>
        <price currency="USD">14000</price>
        <option>
          <optionname>
            Adaptive Cruise Control, Alloy Wheels, Android Auto®, Apple CarPlay®, CD Player, Automatic Emergency Braking, Backup Camera, Brake Assist, Stability Control, Sunroof/Moonroof, Keyless Start, HomeLink, Bluetooth®, Heated Seats, Keyless Entry, Leather Seats, Navigation System, Rain Sensing Wipers, USB Port
          </optionname>
        </option>
        <option>
          <optionname>
            The 2017 Audi A3 2.0T Premium offers a blend of sophistication, performance, and cutting-edge technology in a compact luxury sedan. Powered by a 2.0L 4-cylinder TFSI engine, paired with a 6-speed automatic S tronic transmission, this vehicle delivers responsive handling and efficient performance. The FrontTrak front-wheel-drive system ensures excellent traction for a smooth driving experience. The A3s Cosmos Blue Metallic exterior is paired with a refined gray leather interior, providing both style and comfort.Inside, the A3 boasts a variety of premium features, including a navigation system, Audi MMI Navigation Plus with MMI Touch, and the Audi Virtual Cockpit. It also comes with an array of packages, such as the Premium Plus Package, Sport Package, and Technology Package, offering an extensive list of features like Audi Side Assist, Active Cruise Control, LED Lighting Package, and a Sport Suspension. For entertainment, it's equipped with a 10-speaker sound system, SiriusXM radio, and a USB Audi Music Interface.The car also offers impressive safety features, such as Audi Drive Select, Dual front impact airbags, Brake assist, Electronic Stability Control, and a Rearview Camera. The Panoramic moonroof, Heated front seats, and Sport Seats add to the driving comfort, while the Alloy wheels and Carbon Fiber Package enhance its sporty exterior design.This vehicle has a clean history with no accidents or damage reported. It has had two owners, both of whom maintained the vehicle well, with regular services such as brake and fluid replacements, oil changes, and more. The A3 has a reported mileage of 65,421 miles.For more information or to schedule a test drive, you can call (949) 682-3262 or visit https://www.missionviejokia.com. You can also stop by at 28802 Marguerite Pkwy, Mission Viejo, CA 92692 to explore this stunning Audi A3 in person! Enjoy the benefits of no addendum, no dealer markups, an award-winning dealer, and an Orange County Top Workplace.
          </optionname>
        </option>
        <option>
          <optionname>
            Exterior Color: Cosmos Blue Metallic, Fuel Type: Gasoline, Interior Color: Rock Gray, City MPG: 26, Highway MPG: 35, Stock: K242436A, Drivetrain: Front-wheel Drive, Transmission: 6-Speed Automatic S tronic, Engine: 2L I-4 gasoline direct injection, DOHC, variable valve control,, Mileage: 45425
          </optionname>
        </option>
      </vehicle>

optionname.#text: Adaptive Cruise Control, Alloy Wheels, Android Auto®, Apple CarPlay®, CD Player, Automatic Emergency Braking, Backup Camera, Brake Assist, Stability Control, Sunroof/Moonroof, Keyless Start, HomeLink, Bluetooth®, Heated Seats, Keyless Entry, Leather Seats, Navigation System, Rain Sensing Wipers, USB Port

The 2017 Audi A3 2.0T Premium offers a blend of sophistication, performance, and cutting-edge technology in a compact luxury sedan. Powered by a 2.0L 4-cylinder TFSI engine, paired with a 6-speed automatic S tronic transmission, this vehicle delivers responsive handling and efficient performance. The FrontTrak front-wheel-drive system ensures excellent traction for a smooth driving experience. The A3s Cosmos Blue Metallic exterior is paired with a refined gray leather interior, providing both style and comfort.Inside, the A3 boasts a variety of premium features, including a navigation system, Audi MMI Navigation Plus with MMI Touch, and the Audi Virtual Cockpit. It also comes with an array of packages, such as the Premium Plus Package, Sport Package, and Technology Package, offering an extensive list of features like Audi Side Assist, Active Cruise Control, LED Lighting Package, and a Sport Suspension. For entertainment, it's equipped with a 10-speaker sound system, SiriusXM radio, and a USB Audi Music Interface.The car also offers impressive safety features, such as Audi Drive Select, Dual front impact airbags, Brake assist, Electronic Stability Control, and a Rearview Camera. The Panoramic moonroof, Heated front seats, and Sport Seats add to the driving comfort, while the Alloy wheels and Carbon Fiber Package enhance its sporty exterior design.This vehicle has a clean history with no accidents or damage reported. It has had two owners, both of whom maintained the vehicle well, with regular services such as brake and fluid replacements, oil changes, and more. The A3 has a reported mileage of 65,421 miles.For more information or to schedule a test drive, you can call (949) 682-3262 or visit https://www.missionviejokia.com. You can also stop by at 28802 Marguerite Pkwy, Mission Viejo, CA 92692 to explore this stunning Audi A3 in person! Enjoy the benefits of no addendum, no dealer markups, an award-winning dealer, and an Orange County Top Workplace.

Exterior Color: Cosmos Blue Metallic, Fuel Type: Gasoline, Interior Color: Rock Gray, City MPG: 26, Highway MPG: 35, Stock: K242436A, Drivetrain: Front-wheel Drive, Transmission: 6-Speed Automatic S tronic, Engine: 2L I-4 gasoline direct injection, DOHC, variable valve control,, Mileage: 45425

body_html: Hi Sav, Thank you for your interest in the 2017 Audi A3 2.0T Premium. This model is known for its impressive performance and luxurious interior, making it a great choice for anyone seeking style and comfort. I'm happy to confirm that this vehicle is still available! If you're interested, Jacob Amezola would be thrilled to assist you further. Would you like to schedule a time to come in for a test drive or to discuss it in more detail? You can also reserve your time instantly here: Schedule Your Visit. Please let us know a convenient time for you, or you can instantly reserve your time here: <{LegacySalesApptSchLink}> Patti Mission Viejo Kia 24041 El Toro Rd, Lake Forest, CA 92630
